titlestmt.sponsor: This collection-level EAD record is a product of the Philadelphia Area Consortium of Special Collections Libraries (PACSCL) Consortial Survey Initiative, which was funded by the Andrew W. Mellon Foundation.

profiledesc.creation: Machine-readable finding aid generated in EAD from data in the PACSCL Consortial Survey Database on 12/21/2012. Modified by Dot Porter in 2017.

bioghist.p: William R. Laws, Jr. (1916-1985), was a Presbyterian minister. He served at the First Presbyterian Church in Columbus, Ohio, from 1950 to 1976. In 1976 he became minister at Westminster United Presbyterian Church in Keokuk, Iowa, where he remained until his retirement in 1980. In 1970, he was elected moderator of the General Assembly of the Presbyterian Church in the U.S.A.

scopecontent.p: This is a collection of sermons by William Robert Laws. Some sermons are accompanied by church bulletins or programs. The collection also includes assorted talks, addresses, and funeral services given by Laws.

accessrestrict.p: Access to this collection is restricted; please contact the holding institution for details.
